name: Whisper Ultra Clean XL Plus
description: Feel fresh and protected with Whisper Ultra Clean sanitary pads with wings. Designed especially for heavy flow, these pads provide five times better protection and are 40% longer for extra coverage. Whisper Ultra Clean pads absorbs liquid in seconds, their Dri-Weave cover provides soft, dry protection. Whisper Ultra Clean has you covered so you can get on with the things you love without having to worry about your protection. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
